chapters.title: Prologue: Snow
chapters.info: Arilyn Dhulaine, p. 76 (75)—One of the eyes-and-ears for the Gray Ajah. She is around the middle of Cairhien's nobility. She provided housing to several Aes Sedai in the city that did not want to stay in the Palace or with the Wise Ones. She also provided rooms for Cadsuane while she was in Cairhien.
